result.name: national-scholarship-fund
result.notes:
The National Scholarship Fund provides opportunities for teachers and support staff to deepen their specialist or subject knowledge in four priority areas: English, mathematics, science, and special education needs and disabilities.

Applications are submitted by teachers and support staff for each round of the scheme. The data from these applications is collected and held securely by NCTL within Workplaces. The applications for this competitive scheme are subject to an assessment and verification process to determine the successful applicants.

organization.name: national-college-for-teaching-and-leadership
organization.title: National College for Teaching and Leadership
organization.description: Created on 1 April 2013, when the "National College  for Leadership of Schools and Children's Services" merged with the "Teaching Agency" to become the "National College for Teaching and Leadership".

result.title: National Scholarship Fund

extras.value: The raw data are not published in its current form as it contains data defined as personal and sensitive personal data by the Data Protection Act 1998. Summary data information may be used for management information  purposes e.g. to answer PQs, equality and diversity analysis, etc.
